show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: Alan Cassells
content:
Researcher Alan Cassells, author of Seeking Sickness, looks at dangeous myths behind screening for and treating... <!--more--> hypertension, high cholesterol, and prostate cancer, as well as mammograms and bone density studies for women.
  Get this info before you take or respond to another screening test.
 Every adult should listen to this show and pass it on to others.
